pullrequest.title: [gazebo11] Add helper function PhysicsEngine::any_cast to handle std::any

content.raw: This looks good to me. Certainly a lot cleaner this way. I do wonder if the `any_cast` function be in `PresetManager.hh` since the values being cast are coming from there. There's also a `CastAnyValue` function in `PresetManager.cc`. Do we need to handle `std::any` objects there as well?
content.html: This looks good to me. Certainly a lot cleaner this way. I do wonder if the any_cast function be in PresetManager.hh since the values being cast are coming from there. There's also a CastAnyValue function in PresetManager.cc. Do we need to handle std::any objects there as well?
